venue.name: A.M.C. Highland Center at Crawford Notch

item.description:
We will be meeting at the AMC Highland Center ( 302 Bretton Woods) We are planning to car spot at the Willey house off of 302 about two miles up from the Highland Center. We will begin our hike on the Avalon Trail for 1.2 miles, then the A-Z trail for 1.0 mile We will then take a left and summit Mt Tom .5 mile returning back to the intersection. We will then take the Willey Range Trail 3.4 miles summiting Mt Field and Mt Willey. We will then take Ethan Pond trail for .3 mile then pick up Kedron Flume Trail 1.3 miles to where cars will be awaiting us.

Note that there is still 3-4 feet of snow above 3500ft . Snowshoes and microspikes will be required for this hike. We do have a water crossing so please have proper waterproof hiking boots. Be sure to bring appropriate clothing (no Cotton) The weather is looking good for Sunday but remember it will be cold on the summits so be sure to bring warm hat and mittens along!

We will be hiking as a group ( In as a group and out as a group ) We will be hiking at a pace that is just under book time. If you should have any questions please contact me lonnalee@comcast.net.

Mt Tom (4051)
Mt Field (4340)
Mt Willey (4285)

Advance Hike
Total length: 7.7 miles
Time 8 hours plus



As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.

Directions: Rte 93N, exit 35/Route 3, right onto 302 to the AMC Highland Center. We'll plan to meet in the parking lot.
item.name: Three Four Thousand ftr's Tom, Field, Willey! OH MY!!
